page.title: 01LOWESWATER AREA
page.content: Although Loweswater has few of the modern amenities which characterize a healthy village, no bus, shop or school, it is a very viable community. Some work is available within the area, and people are prepared to travel to work outside the area. Housing is a slight problem, houses being both expensive and scarce. Planning permission for new homes is extremely difficult to obtain and restrictive regulations make them expensive to build. Recreation within the area is well catered for, with so many natural assets. Loweswater is much appreciated, not only by those who live there, but by those visitors who return again and again to enjoy its beauty.
